General.Name: SiS Distribution (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: SiS Distribution (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes computer components, smartphones, and office automation equipment in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Commercial Products, Consumer Products, Value Added Products, and Phones. It is also involved in the servicing and rental of computers and accessories. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

3.Name: Ms. Nattamon  Chotvichien
3.Title: Head of Internal Audit Department & Company Sec.
